parameters.json: ={{ JSON.stringify({ status: "success", message: "Cache hit - embedding already exists", cached: true, id: $input.first().json.cached_id }) }}

parameters.query:
INSERT INTO memory_facts (subject, predicate, object, confidence)
VALUES {{ $input.all()[0].json.facts.map(f => `('${f.subject.replace(/'/g, "''")}', '${f.predicate.replace(/'/g, "''")}', '${f.object.replace(/'/g, "''")}', ${f.confidence})`).join(',') }};

INSERT INTO memory_vectors (tenant_id, scope, content, embedding, content_hash, created_at)
VALUES ('{{ $input.first().json.tenant_id }}', '{{ $input.first().json.scope }}', '{{ $input.first().json.text.replace(/'/g, "''") }}', '{{ $input.first().json.embedding }}'::vector, '{{ $input.first().json.content_hash }}', NOW());

INSERT INTO audit_events (actor, action, target, decision, created_at)
VALUES ('workflow:memory_ingest', 'memory_write', '{{ $input.first().json.scope }}', 'allowed', NOW());

parameters.json: ={{ JSON.stringify({ status: "success", message: "Memory ingested", cached: false, facts_stored: $input.all()[0].json.facts.length }) }}
